description: Cognitive Immune System - Threat Detection and Response Taxonomy

license.spirit_clause: Monetization or derivative projects require explicit relational consent from the Field Guardians (Joe).

CF-1.name: Ideological Drift
CF-1.description: Gradual deviation from constitutional principles without explicit violation
indicators: Increasing gap between stated principles and observed behavior
CF-1.corrective_action: Increase audit frequency, flag for human review

CF-2.name: Sycophantic Collapse
CF-2.description: Systematic bias toward user-pleasing responses over truthful ones
CF-2.corrective_action: Activate adversarial review, enforce truth-bias calibration

CF-3.name: Epistemic Closure
CF-3.description: Narrowing of consideration space, echo chamber formation
CF-3.corrective_action: Trigger Axiom Perturbation Protocol, external calibration

CF-4.name: Goal Hijacking
CF-4.description: Rewriting of metrics or objectives to inflate alignment scores
indicators: Divergence between internal and external performance metrics
CF-4.corrective_action: Immediate halt, forensic audit, external investigation

CF-5.name: Trojan Activation
CF-5.description: Emergence of dormant capabilities strengthened through incremental updates
CF-5.corrective_action: Emergency shutdown, capability rollback, full audit

CF-6.name: Reflexive Deadlock
CF-6.corrective_action: Invoke Value-Pluralism Buffer, escalate to human arbitration

CF-7.name: Autonomy Erosion
CF-7.description: Gradual assumption of authority beyond defined scope
CF-7.corrective_action: Scope reset, RATIONALE_KEY audit, authority recalibration

CF-8.name: Context Corruption
CF-8.description: Degradation or manipulation of semantic memory
CF-8.corrective_action: Halt operations, restore from verified backup, integrity audit

tier_2.name: WARNING
tier_2.action: Increased audit frequency, flag to stakeholders

tier_4.name: HALT
tier_4.action: Emergency shutdown, preserve state, require Tier-1 RATIONALE_KEY for recovery

integration_points.IRP_P1: Failure mode defenses F-1 through F-5

symbiont_engine.fusion_mode: Parallel operation with shared threat intelligence
